project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project is the second agricultural training project and would assist the Government to upgrade the quality of the extension and research services by: (a) improving the quality of middle level training and higher level in-service training of the Ministry of Agriculture (MOA); (b) developing a career development strategy for extension agents; and (c) extending the ongoing Agriculture Management Development Program for one year.
